rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes development/testing factually without high-potency language.
No moderate verb paired with explicit scale/impact.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports developing/testing sample vaccines (action/capability) without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser combined with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
